00019    * Constructor.
00020    */
00021    CosineAngle::CosineAngle()
00022     : nAngleType_(0)
00023    { 
00024       for (int i = 0; i < MaxNAngleType; ++i) {
00025          kappa_[i] = 0.0; 
00026       }
00027    }
00028 
00029    /* 
00030    * Copy constructor.
00031    */
00032    CosineAngle::CosineAngle(const CosineAngle& other)
00033     : nAngleType_(other.nAngleType_)
00034    { 
00035       assert(other.nAngleType_ > 0);
00036       for (int i = 0; i < nAngleType_; ++i) {
00037          kappa_[i] = other.kappa_[i]; 
00038       }
00039    }

00048    * Assignment.
00049    */
00050    CosineAngle& CosineAngle::operator = (const CosineAngle& other)
00051    {
00052       assert(other.nAngleType_ > 0);
00053 
00054       nAngleType_ = other.nAngleType_;
00055       for (int i = 0; i < nAngleType_; ++i) {
00056          kappa_[i] = other.kappa_[i];
00057       }
00058       return *this;
00059    }

00061    /* 
00062    * Set the nAngleType_ member.
00063    */
00064    void CosineAngle::setNAngleType(int nAngleType)
00065    {  
00066       if (nAngleType > MaxNAngleType) {
00067          UTIL_THROW("nAngleType > CosineAngle::MaxNAngleType");
00068       }
00069       nAngleType_ = nAngleType;
00070    }
00071 
00072    /* 
00073    * Read bend interaction parameters kappa from file.
00074    */
00075    void CosineAngle::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00076    {
00077       // Preconditions
00078       if (nAngleType_ <= 0) {
00079          UTIL_THROW("nAngleType must be set before readParam");
00080       }
00081 
00082       // Read parameters
00083       //readBegin(in, "CosineAngle");
00084       readCArray<double>(in, "kappa",  kappa_,  nAngleType_);
00085       //readEnd(in);
00086    }
00087 
00088    /*
00089    * Modify a parameter, identified by a string.
00090    */
00091    void CosineAngle::set(std::string name, int type, double value)
00092    {
00093       if (name == "kappa") {
00094          kappa_[type] = value;
00095       } else {
00096          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00097       }
00098    }
00099 
00100    /*
00101    * Get a parameter value, identified by a string.
00102    */
00103    double CosineAngle::get(std::string name, int type) const
00104    {
00105       double value = 0.0;
00106       if (name == "kappa") {
00107          value = kappa_[type];
00108       } else {
00109          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00110       }
00111       return value;
00112    }
